metadata.name: Suspicious Calculator Usage
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious use of 'calc.exe' with command line parameters or in a suspicious directory, which is likely caused by some PoC or detection evasion.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\calc.exe ')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\calc.exe')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\winsxs\\\\')))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious use of 'calc.exe' with command line parameters or in a suspicious directory, which is likely caused by some PoC or detection evasion.
